long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A friendly tab that makes you smile, everytime you search the net.
Search Result will be provided by Microsoft BING.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing "Smile N Search" search setting will be provided by Microsoft Bing and that provided by the service, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
